ai_summary: This commit modifies several documentation files related to Microsoft Entra ID Governance and Protection. Key changes include updates to the lifecycle workflow tasks documentation, specifically detailing the "Remove all access package assignments for user" task, including the ability to specify a delay before removal. There are also updates to the PIM documentation about assigning roles with administrative unit scope. Finally, there is an update to the documentation around risk-based policy impact.

author: rolyon

The change updates a sentence regarding the assignment of custom roles with administrative unit scope. Specifically, the link to "Add and remove administrative units" was updated to "Create or delete administrative units".

author: rolyon
ai_summary: This commit modifies the documentation for lifecycle workflow tasks, specifically focusing on the "Remove all access package assignments for user" task. The changes include updating the description to reflect the ability to customize the task and the addition of a new parameter "daysUntilExpiration" to specify when access package assignments are removed. Additionally, there's a corresponding update to the image related to this task.

author: James Barnett

Merge pull request #9533 from OWinfreyATL/owinfreyATL-AccessPackageAssignmentBehavior-PublicPreview

Assignment package workflow Public Preview
ai_summary: This commit updates the documentation for lifecycle workflow tasks in Microsoft Entra. Specifically, it details the "Remove all access package assignments for user" task, including new information on customizing the task's behavior, like specifying the number of days until the assignments are removed.  The changes include modifications to the markdown file and a related image, reflecting the added functionality.

author: Ortagus Winfrey
ai_summary: This commit modifies the `docs/id-governance/lifecycle-workflow-tasks.md` file. The change adds a new line describing the "arguments" parameter for the "Remove all access package assignments for user" task within the Microsoft Graph section. This new line explains that the argument includes a "daysUntilExpiration" parameter.

author: Ortagus Winfrey
ai_summary: This commit updates the documentation for lifecycle workflows in Microsoft Entra ID. Specifically, it modifies the "lifecycle-workflow-tasks.md" file to reflect new functionality in the "Remove all access package assignments for user" task.  The update includes information about customizing the task name, description, and the ability to specify when access package assignments are removed, along with a corresponding code example.  Additionally, a related image file is updated, though without any actual content changes.
